content:
Dear All,

In BodyStructure resource (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/bodystructure.html) one can read :
"The BodyStructure resource supports recording and tracking of an anatomic location or structure on a patient outside the context of another resource. For example it can be the target of a Procedure resource or Observation resource."

The BodyStructure resource is, however, nowhere to find in the Observation resource : https://www.hl7.org/fhir/observation.html
Same for the Procedure resource.

Am I missing something ?
Thanks in advance for your clarifications.
